channel.title: Adding vengeance into emotes tab
channel.description:
hey umm sometimes when my players and myself veng on my server they have to do it in ancients, which can be a problem because sometimes it doesnt work right
which is why i just want a button just like allstarscape to click veng in the emotes tab so it will work more often. thank you
yours truly, 2h slapped
